plot: Las Flores de Mama is a short narrative about displacement and perseverance that follows one woman's negotiation of these difficult circumstances through a subtle lens of magical realism. ...
title: Las Flores de Mamá
plot_es: Las Flores de Mama is a short narrative about displacement and perseverance that follows one woman's negotiation of these difficult circumstances through a subtle lens of magical realism. ...
plot_en: Las Flores de Mama is a short narrative about displacement and perseverance that follows one woman's negotiation of these difficult circumstances through a subtle lens of magical realism. ...
